description:
In Episode 2 of “Diary of a Madman,” Victoria Voxxx finds herself trapped with her obsessed admirer, with no hope in sight. As she toils in captivity – gagged, flogged, electrified, whipped, and tied up – a million questions run through her panicked head. What are this madman’s intentions? And why her specifically?

Her first night comes to a close, and as a new day begins, it’s evident that Victoria’s about to get more answers than she suspected. But she will not give up resisting…or so she thinks.

All 4 episodes of this series:
Episode 1: “The Hunt:
Episode 2: “Working The New Pet”
Episode 3: “The Test”
Episode 4: “Problem Solved”
title: Diary of a Madman, Episode 2: "Working The New Pet"
